content.webTitle: Pete Townshend Says 'I'm Not a Pedophile'

fields.headline: Pete Townshend Says 'I'm Not a Pedophile'
fields.bodyText: Reuters: "British rock star Pete Townshend, guitarist with legendary band The Who, on Saturday admitted paying to view Internet child pornography but denied he was a pedophile and said it was for research purposes." The Guardian has the story from Ananova.
